item.title: Shop by Neighborhood Map
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Shop around Brooklyn and find cool stuff made in your neighborhood!

The post Shop by Neighborhood Map appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
As card-carrying Brooklynited, we love the new Shop by Neighborhood map we’ve created for Brooklyn Makers. From letterpress stationery in Clinton Hill to unique porcelain bowls in Ditmas Park, you can shop around Brooklyn and find cool stuff made in your neighborhood – check it out on Brooklyn Makers

The post Shop by Neighborhood Map appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Page Clements Voice Coach
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Logo design for Page Clements Vocal Instruction DVDs for actors

The post Page Clements Voice Coach appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Logo choices for a voice coaching DVD

We created the identity and website design for a voice coaching DVD featuring Page Clements. Page is a voice coach specializing in vocal warmups and exercises for actors. We wanted the logo to resonated with a younger audience, it’s personality is very welcoming and just looks vocally interesting.

Revision 02 of chosen mark

Revision 01 of chosen mark

Logo Concepts

The post Page Clements Voice Coach appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Berit Anderson Tutoring
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Berit has quickly become one of our favorite clients. She put a lot of faith in us and asked us to create something original & artistic (a dream come true). Her business is tutoring for high school students (think SAT, LSAT…) The tagline she came up with: ‘fireflies are crepuscular’, is an example of a […]

The post Berit Anderson Tutoring appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Berit has quickly become one of our favorite clients. She put a lot of faith in us and asked us to create something original & artistic (a dream come true). Her business is tutoring for high school students (think SAT, LSAT…) The tagline she came up with: ‘fireflies are crepuscular’, is an example of a device she uses to help kids remember complicated vocab words. It was also the inspiration for her visual identity:

The post Berit Anderson Tutoring appeared first on mimoYmima.
